name: Que-Hay-De-Ti (Adome)
description:
2D, Platformer, Souls-like Game

If you get angry quickly and don't have much patience, this game is not for you.

If you don't learn the right pattern, it's easy to die in this game, it's even easier to go crazy.

Story of the Game:

The story of someone who finds himself in a wooded area and knows that his aim is to overcome the obstacles that come before him with the help of a sword and reach the doors.

Game Purpose:

Simply, by taking good tactics from the signs, to reach the doors, with the help of your sword. 

How to Play:

Control System: Left-Right Arrow Keys or A-D to move.

Space or W for jump.

F for Attack.

E for open gates

A GAME BY: DEVELOPMERT
